summary: This document is an email chain regarding a draft press conference advisory for Ghislaine Maxwell, dated July 1, 2020. It shows internal communication about finalizing the advisory, with a focus on including COVID-19 distancing protocols.

persons.name: Ghislaine Maxwell
persons.context: The email chain is about finalizing a draft advisory for her press conference scheduled for July 2, 2020.

events.title: Ghislaine Maxwell Press Conference
events.description: A press conference was scheduled for Ghislaine Maxwell, with a draft advisory being circulated and edited internally on July 1, 2020.

keyFacts: A press conference for Ghislaine Maxwell was scheduled for July 2, 2020.
Internal email correspondence on July 1, 2020, shows discussion about finalizing a draft advisory for the press conference.
The email chain includes edits highlighting COVID-19 distancing protocols for the event.
